title: How to Win Back Cold Leads and Past Customers
description: Simple outreach campaigns to reactivate leads who never booked and customers who haven't called in a while.
requirements: A list of old leads or past customers

steps.title: Make a list of people to contact
steps.description: Gather your cold leads and dormant customers.
substeps: Cold leads: People who got quotes but never booked
Past customers: Haven't hired you in 6+ months
Check your texts, CRM, and invoices
steps.tip: Past customers are gold — they already trust you. Reaching out is easy revenue.

steps.title: Create a reactivation message for cold leads
steps.description: Use ChatGPT to write a 'checking in' message.
substeps: Type: 'Write a short, friendly text to follow up with someone who got a quote from my [trade] business 2 months ago but never booked. Keep it casual, not salesy.'

Example output: 'Hey [Name], this is Mike from [Business]. Wanted to check in — still need help with that [project]? Happy to answer any questions or re-quote if things have changed. No pressure either way!'

steps.title: Create a message for past customers
steps.description: Remind them you exist and offer value.
substeps: Prompt: 'Write a friendly text to a past customer I haven't heard from in 6 months. I'm a [trade] business. Remind them I'm available and mention seasonal relevance if applicable.'
Example: 'Hey [Name]! Hope you're doing well. Just wanted to check in — if you need any [service] help this season, I'd love to work with you again. Let me know!'
steps.tip: Timing matters — reach out before their busy season (spring for landscaping, winter for HVAC, etc.)

steps.title: Send the messages
steps.description: Personal texts work better than mass blasts.
substeps: Personalize each message with their name
Reference the specific job or quote if you remember it
Send via text — higher response rate than email
Space them out (don't send 20 texts in 5 minutes)

steps.title: Track responses and follow up
substeps: Reply quickly to anyone who responds
No response after a week? One more message, then move on
Add responders back to your active pipeline

successMessage: You just reached out to dormant contacts! Expect 10-20% to convert into jobs.
proTips: Do a reactivation campaign every quarter — it's the easiest marketing you can do
Offering a small discount can increase response rates significantly
Add 'Is this still your number?' if texting old contacts — shows you care and verifies contact info
